briefTitle: Prospective Study of Patients With Thrombocytopenia Following HSCT

outcomeMeasures.title: Number of Participants With Platelet Count Recovery
outcomeMeasures.description: Platelet response refers to a sustained increase (stable or increasing level) of at least 30×10E9/L independent of transfusion for 3 days.

outcomeMeasures.title: Megakaryocyte Count
outcomeMeasures.description: The total number of megakaryocytes as well as the platelet-shedding megakaryocytes of bone marrow smears (per cm2) was counted and cross-checked by blinded observers.
